amendment.description: Amendment provides for a study to determine to what extent the actions of lenders and guarantors impact upon the default rates of student borrowers as it relates to the servicing of the loans or the due diligence of the loan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 27 in the Congressional Record of April 28, 1998 to to direct the Education Secretary to study the impact that guarantors and lenders have on student loan default rates.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
